title: Olivia Pope We Need You!
itunes:title: Olivia Pope We Need You!
description:
2-22- After more news broke about Jussie Smolletts scandal, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners believe that Smollett could make a comeback after this and if they were Olivia Pope what plan would they have to swindle Jussie out of his situation. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines for our listeners to nominate someone for "Donkey of the Day". Also, for our Freaky Friday topic we wanted to see what our women listeners would do if they found out their man was lying about being straight, after someone emailed DJ Envy for help about that same situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
